titles.title: Protecting Consumers from Unreasonable Credit Rates Act of 2009
A bill to amend the Truth in Lending Act to establish a national usury rate for consumer credit transactions.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2570-2571, S2572-2573)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
